0.title: Dafi Lip balm
0.description:
• Moisturizes and protects the skin of the lips
  • Soothes and reduces inflammation of the lips
  • Contains nutrients and essential vitamins and extracts
  • Moisturizes and protects the skin of the lips
  • Soothes and reduces inflammation of the lips
  • Available in 4 flavors: wild berry, lime strawberry, pineapple coconut and vanilla.
How to use:
  • Apply the required amount of balm on the lips. You can use it alone for daily care, before bed, as a makeup base, or you can use it after makeup.
Vanilla
LimeStrawberry
Wild berry
Pineapple Coconut
